subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks hired the former N.B.A. head coach Paul Westphal to be an assistant under Avery Johnson. Westphal, out of the league since being fired as Seattle’s coach 15 games into the 2000-1 season, went 267-159 with Phoenix (1992-95) and Seattle (1998-2000).
